cards.title: Schedule Agreement
cards.content: Set a fixed weekly time (e.g., 90 min) and a start time.

cards.title: Create Disturbance-Free Space
cards.content: Ensure a quiet environment without distractions or visitors.

cards.title: Establish Clear Rules
cards.content: Agree on a fixed speaking time (e.g., 15 min) and strict listening protocol.

cards.title: Ritual Foundation
cards.content: Make the session a fixed, non-negotiable ritual that isn't skipped.

cards.title: Radical Empathy
cards.content: Your only task is to listen with full attention, without your own agenda.

cards.title: Strict Taboos
cards.content: Absolute prohibition: No interrupting, judging, advising, or non-verbal rejection (e.g., eye-rolling).

cards.title: Embrace Silence
cards.content: When your partner pauses to think, remain still even if the silence feels long.

cards.title: Speaker/Listener Roles
cards.content: The speaker says 'I think/feel...', the listener only listens attentively without judgment.

cards.title: Call Time-Out
cards.content: Stop the conversation as soon as you or your partner feel emotionally overwhelmed.

cards.title: Calm Down Physically
cards.content: Use the pause for calming activities (e.g., reading, walking), not to brood.

cards.title: Resume Conversation
cards.content: Resume the dialogue within 24 hours to avoid the conflict from escalating.

speaker.title: Speaker Guidelines
rules: Absolute taboos: No interrupting, judging, advising, dismissive reactions

listener.title: Listener Guidelines
rules: Absolute taboos: No interrupting, commenting, judging, or non-verbal dismissal

intro.title: Welcome to Couples Timer
intro.subtitle: Your guide to structured partner conversations
intro.description: This tool helps you practice the Zwiegespräch method - a structured conversation technique that creates space for deep connection and understanding between partners.

moeller.title: The Zwiegespräch Method
moeller.description: Developed by psychologist Michael Lukas Moeller, the Zwiegespräch is a structured dialogue method that has helped thousands of couples deepen their connection through regular, intentional conversations.

principle1.title: Equal speaking time
principle1.desc: Each partner gets the same amount of uninterrupted time to express themselves.

principle2.title: No interruptions
principle2.desc: The listening partner remains silent, giving full attention without responding.

principle3.title: Active listening
principle3.desc: Focus entirely on understanding, not on formulating your response.

adaptations.title: Our Adaptations
adaptations.description: We've enhanced the classic method with features designed to deepen the experience and support emotional connection.

transition.title: 1-minute silent transition
transition.desc: After each speaking turn, a moment of silence helps process what was shared and prepare for what comes next.

regulation.title: Emotional regulation
regulation.desc: The pause prevents reactive responses and gives space for emotions to settle naturally.

audio.title: Gentle singing bowl cues
audio.desc: Subtle audio signals mark phase transitions, so you can stay present without watching the clock.

maintain.title: Maintain Mode
maintain.desc: Weekly relationship maintenance conversation - keep connection strong

commitment.title: Commitment Mode
commitment.desc: Stabilization during crisis phases - more frequent, focused sessions

listening.title: Listening Mode
listening.desc: Beginner-friendly mode with more guidance - perfect for starting out

custom.title: Custom Mode
custom.description: For advanced users who want full control over their conversation structure. Once you're familiar with the method, create your own perfect session.

feature1.title: Adjust phase durations
feature1.desc: Set exactly how long each speaking turn and transition lasts.

feature2.title: Choose number of rounds
feature2.desc: Add or remove rounds to match your available time.

feature3.title: Save your configuration
feature3.desc: Create and save multiple custom modes for different situations.

custom.tip: Tip: Start with a preset mode to learn the rhythm before customizing.

ready.title: Choose Your Mode
ready.subtitle: We recommend starting with Listening Mode for your first conversation.
ready.note: Select a mode, then click "Start Session" to begin your first conversation.
